args: for /f "delims=" %d in ('dir /b /o-d "%USERPROFILE%\.claude\plugins\cache\claude-code-lsps\al-language-server-go-windows" 2^>nul ^| findstr /n "^" ^| findstr /b "1:"') do @for /f "tokens=1,* delims=:" %a in ("%d") do @"%USERPROFILE%\.claude\plugins\cache\claude-code-lsps\al-language-server-go-windows\%b\bin\al-lsp-wrapper.exe"
